skills.name: Calamity Tear
skills.desc: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Tough Cuts
skills.desc: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to all targets, with a small chance to inflict Imprisonment on the target.

skills.name: The Breakdown of Tyranny
skills.desc: Deals Imaginary DMG to all targets, with a small chance to cause Imprisonment.
